divs: Sighting DetailsAt approx. 10pm 62303, I saw a blue white light zip and pause across the skygoing east to west at incredible speed. No man-made machine could go that fast. I have witnessed plenty of shooting stars, meteor showers, aurora borealus -but have never seen anything move like this object with its stoppulsezip actionacross the sky at that rate of speed. I dont know what it was but I know I havefinally seen my first ufo.
Summary: White light skipping across the sky at incredible
